creditline: Gift of LeRoy and Cathie Draine in appreciation of Nigerian art and culture
description: abstracted image of green human-like figure at LL reaching toward large, blue, catlike creature with geometric patterns; abstracted trees at L and R with diamond-shaped leaves extending across upper edge
markings: lower margin in pencil: 5/5 | pencil marks on back
signed: lower margin, in pencil: Fight with One-eyed Leopard | Deep etching | Bruce Onobrakpeya | November 1970 | [illeg.]
title: Fight with One-eyed Leopard
